## Checklist

### Code Quality

- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors
- [ ] I have run `pnpm lint` and fixed all issues
- [ ] I have run `pnpm type-check` with no errors

### Testing

- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] E2E tests pass locally

### Documentation

- [ ] I have updated the documentation accordingly
- [ ] I have added JSDoc comments to new functions/components
- [ ] I have updated the README if needed

### Accessibility

- [ ] I have tested for accessibility (keyboard navigation, screen readers)
- [ ] Color contrast meets WCAG AA standards
- [ ] All interactive elements are properly labeled

### Performance

- [ ] I have considered the performance impact of my changes
- [ ] No unnecessary re-renders introduced
- [ ] Bundle size impact has been considered

### Security

- [ ] I have reviewed the changes for potential security issues
- [ ] No sensitive data is exposed in the code
- [ ] Input validation is implemented where necessary
